questions.question: Statements

answers.option: Hybris 6.7 uses Drools version 7.0 as rule engine
The rule engine is used by the Promotion Engine of Hybris
You can use the rule engine also for OMS.
answers.explanation: You can use it for Bundle rules, Order Management Services Warehouse and Sourcing rules, and OCM rules

answers.option: Only the latest rule is stored in Hybris
answers.explanation: Rule Engine includes a versioning and archiving of rules mechanism, which ensures all changes made to the DroolsRule Model are being reported.

questions.question: Statements

answers.option: In the promotin engine you can only deploy 1 rule module at the same time.
It is not possible to preview rules
answers.explanation: Multiple Rule Module Support with enhanced workflow is supported. With thisRule module functionality has been enhanced to provide preview and staging as well as administration of Rule Modules. With the new multi modules functionality a retailer can review their rules or promotions in one environment and when satisfied with the results deploy to the storefront environment.

questions.question: What is KIE Module and what is true about them?

answers.option: It is a "Knowledge is everything" module
It is something that contains knowledge definitions. Like promotion definitions.
When the Storefront and the backend module are swapped, there will be a moment that there will be no active module.
answers.explanation: At some point, both the KIE module and the cloned module run in parallel.  Once the modification is finished, the system automatically exchanges the original KIE module for the cloned module with the changes you made.

answers.option: The event RuleEngineModuleSwapEvent is published when modules have been swapped
answers.explanation: RuleEngineModuleSwapCompletedEvent

questions.question: Versioning of Source Rules

answers.option: Each Source Rule is versioned starting with version 1.
answers.explanation: Each Source Rule is versioned starting with version 0.

answers.option: When you modify a frozen (or published) version of the Source Rule, the Rule Engine creates an increment version.
You can not modify a rule with status PUBLISHED
answers.explanation: When the rule has the PUBLISHED status, you can still modify this rule, but when you save the changes, a new version (an increment) is created.

answers.option: You can not modify a rule with status PUBLISHED if there is also an UNPUBLISHED version of the same promotion
answers.explanation: When one of the rule versions has the UNPUBLISHED status, only that version can be modified. An attempt to modify any other version, including those versions with the PUBLISHED status, results in an error.

questions.question: Statements about fraud detection.

answers.option: The standard fraud detection relies on third party services
answers.explanation: The fraud functionality contains a standard fraud detection service which does not rely on third party service providers. Therefore it has to be seen as a first level checking facility at no additional cost but which is also unlikely to reach the accuracy of third party services.

answers.option: A custom third party fraud detection should implement FraudServiceProvider
The item ProductOrderLimit can hold a config to determine a max amount of orders in a given time. For example > 3 orders per week triggers fraud dections
answers.explanation: It is related to a single product

answers.option: The WhiteListSymptom will increase the score with 500
answers.explanation: The whitlist will decrease the score with 500!

questions.question: Which of the following fraud detection symptons is a real implementation to validate that the email address is whitelisted.

answers.explanation: Mockup - based on a static email/userId list.
Checks if user is a first timer.
Mockup - checks if address rules apply.
Mockup - checks if a order value threshold was reached.
Mockup - checks if product order limit apply (in the mockup:maxNumberPerOrder only).
All the symptons are sample/mock implementations.

questions.explanation: whiteListSymptom => hardcoded list of email addresses

questions.question: Statements about orderhistory.

answers.option: The OrderHistoryService.createHistorySnapshot(OrderModel) will create a copy of the orderModel
answers.explanation: The provided item type OrderHistoryEntry is intended to store historical information about each order processing action. It does not create a new version of the original order. Such entries belong to the original order and will be removed in case the original order is removed.

answers.option: If an order is removed all history date is removed as well.
A snapshot order will have a different order code
answers.explanation: The attribute versionID is used

questions.question: Statements about replenishment.

answers.option: The createOrderFromCartCronJob runs on a dayly or hourly basis for all customers
answers.explanation: The service ScheduleOrderService creates an instance of this job when an order and schedules when it should be executed.

answers.option: A customer can schedule a weekly order
It is part of the basecommerce extension

questions.question: Statements about store locator.

answers.option: The OpeningSchedule contains the opening and closing days of a point of service.
GeoWebServiceWrapper hides all the communication to the third party geocoding services, for example Google Maps.
The GeoWebServiceWrapper service interfaces use: GPS and DistanceAndRoute
answers.explanation: They return GPS and DistanceAndRoute. DistanceAndRoute getDistanceAndRoute(final GPS start, final Location dest) throws GeoServiceWrapperException;

answers.option: Google does not allow you to cache known locations
answers.explanation: you are permitted to "cache" known locations (such as store locations), as long as you do not store them for more than 30 days.

answers.option: The basecommerce extension is delivered with a GoogleMaps implementation for the storelocator out-of-the box.
answers.explanation: a mock implementation out-of-the box. This implementation does not trigger any external webservice call; instead, it returns pre-defined geolocations. These geolocations are unique for each country. For example, a geolocation in the United States will always return 40.7127, 74.0059, or in Germany, 52.514524, 13.35029. If no country can be found on the submitted address, or if the geocode is not configured for the submitted country, then a default geolocation is returned.

answers.option: The basecommerce extension come with a RouteService that can get the route and distance information between two points on the map.

The cmsoccaddon AddOn allows you to query CMS page and component data using the OCC CMS REST API.

Statements about yforms

answers.option: Web forms can be added to the storefront to guide customers through the purchase process.
yForms is a flexible and powerful third party web forms solution that integrated with SAP Commerce.
answers.explanation: yForms is a flexible and powerful web forms solution that is tightly integrated with SAP Commerce. The module is built with the integration of Orbeon Forms Professional Edition and only works after you have successfully installed the Orbeon module on your machine.

answers.option: It is intented for the selling of complex products and services.
It is based on the W3C XForms standard and enables business users to create and manage large forms with complex validation and dependencies.
The web-based Form Builder is completely integrated into the Backoffice
Optional attachments, such as images, PDF files, and other file attachments, uploaded to the yForms are supported.

questions.question: Statements about subscriptions.

answers.option: A good example of an entitlement is: A subscription to Telenet Sports as addition to your digital TV subscription
answers.explanation: Entitlements are options that can be included in a product at no additional costs. These represent privileges that can be granted to a customer along with a purchased product. For example, it can be a permission to read a digital magazine on a tablet.

answers.option: A good example of an entitlement is: A permission to read a digital magazine on a tablet.

questions.question: Which of the following are CIS?
questions.explanation:
CIS = Commerce Infrastructure Services
For each service type, SAP Commerce provides a Maven archetype that can be used to generate the skeleton code for a custom service implementation. This custom service implementation can provide the entire service from scratch or it can delegate to a third-party service provider.

questions.question: What should you do to enable CIS?

answers.option: Add the extension cis to you localetextension.
answers.explanation: Extension cisclient

answers.option: You should add an addon for intregration with the accelerator
You need Core+ to enable CIS
answers.explanation: Starting with the 6.3 release, you can use the cisclient extensions to interact with CIS services deployed on a CIS server without using the Core+ framework. This allows you to connect to any service which follows the CIS principles.

questions.question: Statements.

answers.option: Rule Engine uses Drools version 7.0 as its backbone implementation.
The rule egine is only intented for promotions.

Across SAP Commerce platform, you can use it for Bundle rules, Order Management Services Warehouse and Sourcing rules, and OCM rules. The perfect sample implementation is Promotion Engine, which allows businesses to create and manage promotions and runs on top of Rule Engine.

answers.option: Rule Engine includes a versioning and archiving of rules mechanism

questions.question: Statements addons.

answers.option: AddOns extend the functionality of the SAP Commerce Accelerator.
It is possible to plug a new populator into an already existing converter
It is not possible to add a new Controller.
It is recommended that you put as much logic into your AddOns as possible
answers.explanation: We recommend that you put as much logic into your AddOns as possible. The advantage of this is that whenever you need to upgrade your Accelerator code base, you do not need to merge the changes manually. By having the logic put into the AddOns, you can build a library of self-contained, reusable components that you can use for your future projects.

answers.option: You should use yaddon to create a new addon

questions.question: Statements addons.

answers.option: The system uses the ant sync task to keep the contents of the acceleratoraddon up to date with the contents of counterpart storefront extensions.

This is a valid command to add addons:
ant addoninstall -Daddonnames="NewAddOn1,NewAddOn2" -DaddonStorefront.yacceleratorstorefront="B2CStorefront1,B2CStorefront2" -DaddonStorefront.yb2bacceleratorstorefront="B2BStorefront1,B2BStorefront2"
The addonuninstall tool can be used to remove an AddOn from the storefront.
answers.explanation: ant addonuninstall -Daddonnames="AddOnName1,AddOnName2" -DaddonStorefront.<storefrontTemplateName>="Storefront1,Storefront2"

questions.question: In which of the following scenario's would you use an addon?
Statements Accelerator.

answers.option: Hybris does not forsee patches for your webshop implemented with Accelerator
answers.explanation: SAP Commerce Commerce Accelerator is released as source and is implementation templates. Due to the template character of Accelerators and their need for intense customization, you cannot apply patches to customized Accelerator storefront templates. Therefore, we do not offer backports of bug fixes for Accelerator storefront templates for prior releases of Accelerator. You must maintain your Accelerator storefront template implementations on your own once you customize the template.

answers.option: SAP Commerce Accelerator is delivered partially as source code.
answers.explanation: AP Commerce Accelerator is delivered completely as source code.

answers.option: Use extgen to generate copies of the Accelerator extensions, using your project's naming conventions.
answers.explanation: . Use modulegen to generate copies of the Accelerator extensions, using your project's naming conventions.

answers.option: To access the sample storefronts, you must add a localhost mapping to your computer's hosts file
answers.explanation: There is an alternative shortcut approach of using a site parameter. However, this only allows you to visit one site in the same browser session.
